metadata.Title: CVE-2018-12022 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in FasterXML jackson-databind prior to 2.7.9.4,2.8.11.2, and 2.9.6. When Default Typing is enabled (either globally or fora specific property), the service has the Jodd-db jar (for database accessfor the Jodd framework) in the classpath, and an attacker can provide anLDAP service to access, it is possible to make the service execute amalicious payload.

criterions.comment: jackson-databind package in trusty/esm is affected and needs fixing.
